div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 640 Viisoara, c. 35 km. SW of Bacau, Ru- mania, 1957 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. Contents: 821 AR. Pot hoard Thasos: 2 spread-flan tetradr. Imit. Thasos: 4 tetradr. Apollonia, Illyria: 3 dr. Dyrrhachium: 812 dr. incl. some imit. Disposition: Piatra Neamt and Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) Mitrea, SCN 2 (1958), pp. 27-93, illus.; 3 (1960), pp. 449-50; Dacia 1968, p. 449
